TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>類別用來提供事件的值給<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件和可讓您指定自訂的 Windows 身分識別目前的要求。 您可以存取<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件的<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>類別，藉由指定名為副程式**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中。
<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>物件使用目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將它傳遞給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。
您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>的屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>物件提供給**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>期間的屬性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>用。
**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名識別時，才會引發事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.HttpContext context) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>物件使用目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。 它接著會傳遞<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>物件至**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AnonymousID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AnonymousID : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the anonymous identifier for the user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>屬性的匿名識別項設定為某個自訂值期間**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>期間的屬性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>用。
**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名識別時，才會引發事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件設定為某個自訂值的匿名識別項。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As HttpContext
public: property System::Web::HttpContext ^ Context { System::Web::HttpContext ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the object for the current HTTP request.
Docs.value: 目前 HTTP 要求的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>提供存取權<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>目前要求的物件。
